value.name: The People v. Bill Gates
value.description: As the disease spread, rumours began to link it with the crimes committed in Edinburgh in 1828 by William Burke and William Hare, who murdered at least sixteen people and sold the corpses to the anatomist Robert Knox, a lecturer at the University of Edinburgh.

value.name: Knox, Ronald Dean “Ronnie”
value.description: He was preceded in death by his father, Robert Knox Sr. and brother, Robert Knox, Jr. He is survived by his mother, Robbie Smith; fiancee, Regina Perdue; son, Jeff Knox; sister, Kellie Shetter ...

value.name: Race Myths
value.description: Europe produced a host of eminently respectable race scientists, such as the now-forgotten Robert Knox, who wrote in his book, The Races Of Man: 'We must learn to look at this with composure ...

value.name: Wooley, Annie Floyd Knox
value.description: Services will be held on Saturday, Feb. 27, at 12:30 p.m. at Westside Baptist Church with Rev. Timothy Careathers officiating and Rev. Robert Knox, Eulogist. Interment will be in Forest Hills ...
